data.client_settings: Since Discord Htc Desire 526 Android v5.1.0 3.8.0 - Discord Alpha 3.9.7(396)
data.actual_result: BT stops using it's mic having to fully close Discord and even Disconnect the BT accesory and reconnect it
data.expected_result: When connecting BT earphones everything should be fine
data.short_description: When connected in a voice channel and decide to connect some Bluetooth earphones, no one can hear you
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect into a voice channel - Connect some BT headphones - Talk and ask someone in the chat who is connected in VC if they can hear you
